net.netnook.repeg.expressions.core

Class CharacterExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.netnook.repeg.expressions.ExpressionBase
      • net.netnook.repeg.expressions.core.CharacterExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expression, ExpressionBuilder, SimpleExpression, Visitable

    public final class CharacterExpression
extends ExpressionBase
implements SimpleExpression
    Character expression e.g. ''[a]'' (character 'a'), ''[a-z]'' (lower case ascii letter).

    This expression matches individual characters in the input. By default a single character is matched but the minCount and maxCount properties can be used to match repeating characters. This expression will match only if the minimum number of repeats are matched (default 1) and will never consume more than the maximum number of repetitions (default 1).

    This expression has no default OnSuccessHandler.
